data.title: Biography of Christian X King Denmark 1870
meta_keywords: King Christian IX of Denmark Dies
data.meta_description: Biography of Christian X King Denmark 1870-1947 including his birth, marriages, death and life events, life events of his siblings, and his ancestry to five generations, royal ancestors and royal descendants.
data.text:
On 26 Sep 1870 Christian X King Denmark was born to Frederick VIII King Denmark 1843-1912 (age 27) and Louise of Sweden Queen Consort Denmark (age 18).

On 28 Jul 1869 [his father] Frederick VIII King Denmark 1843-1912 (age 26) and [his mother] Louise of Sweden Queen Consort Denmark (age 17) were married. He a great x 3 grandson of King George II of Great Britain and Ireland 1683-1760. He the son of King Christian IX of Denmark 1818-1906 (age 51) and Queen Louise Hesse-Kassel of Denmark (age 51).

On 26 Apr 1898 Christian X King Denmark (age 27) and Alexandrine Mecklenburg-Schwerin Queen Consort Denmark (age 18) were married. He a great x 4 grandson of King George II of Great Britain and Ireland 1683-1760. She by marriage Queen Consort Denmark. He the son of Frederick VIII King Denmark 1843-1912 (age 54) and Louise of Sweden Queen Consort Denmark (age 46).

In or before 1906 Wilhelm Hohenzollern (age 23) and [his sister-in-law] Princess Cecilie Mecklenburg Schwerin (age 19) were married. They were half third cousins. He a great grandson of Queen Victoria of the United Kingdom 1819-1901. He the son of Wilhelm Hohenzollern (age 46) and Empress Auguste Viktoria Oldenburg (age 47).

On 29 Jan 1906 [his grandfather] King Christian IX of Denmark 1818-1906 (age 87) died. His son [his father] Frederick VIII King Denmark 1843-1912 (age 62) succeeded VIII King Denmark. [his mother] Louise of Sweden Queen Consort Denmark (age 54) by marriage Queen Consort Denmark.

On 14 May 1912 [his father] Frederick VIII King Denmark 1843-1912 (age 68) died. His son Christian X King Denmark (age 41) succeeded X King Denmark.

On 20 Mar 1926 [his mother] Louise of Sweden Queen Consort Denmark (age 74) died.

On 20 Apr 1947 Christian X King Denmark (age 76) died.

On 28 Dec 1952 [his former wife] Alexandrine Mecklenburg-Schwerin Queen Consort Denmark (age 73) died.
